headline: IDEX: A Wonderful Business Finally Trading At A Real Undervaluation
summary: IDEX stands out as a resilient, wide-moat industrial with strong cash flow, M&A strategy, and improved valuation supporting long-term upside. See why IEX stock is a buy.
